text: Manipur Polo International 2018 or 12th Manipur International Polo Tournament is a Polo Tournament that was held in Imphal, Manipur. It was organised in Mapal Kangjeibung (Imphal Polo Ground), the oldest polo ground in the world. India-B team (Manipur team) won the trophy after defeating England by 7-4 goals. Uruguay defeated USA by 3-1 goals. USA defeated India-A team by 13-2 goals. == Participants == * * * * * == References == Category:Polo competitions in Manipur Category:2018 in sports Category:2010s in Indian sport
title: Manipur Polo International 2018
